WUNC operates from the budget of its parent organization,

co make an accurate statement of the operating budget
lor WUNC alone. The figure shorn is quite definitely
an estimate.
The sum indicated for television comes from private
sources.
WUNC, together with the Communications Center, furnishes
numerous programs to state broadensts-some go to more
than 50 stations; others are heard only on single staÂ¬
tions. The figure shown is an estimate of the number
of hours of programming furnished, irrespective of the
number of stations originating the programs.
